message.raw:
Added base code for RemoteStage, a Zaber stage controlled by a Raspberry Pi.
The stage is triggered to move during an experiment by a digital input.
For now this is written to our specific application, but could be generalised later.
Not tested on hardware yet, probably full of bugs.
